tool_description: This API will help you to send your user an OTP for any purpose like login, signup, forget-password and much more. The response is in JSON form it returns authenticationCode(MD5) in response for succesfull request with you can store and validate it with users input.
name: Email Authentication System
title: Email Authentication System

api_list.name: Sending OTP
api_list.description:
* **```recipient```**: This parameter is the email address at which you want to send the email.
* **```app```**: This parameter is used to display the message to user from which Application the OTP is being generated from with Application.

 This API sends the OTP to the provided email and returns the Authentication code(MD5 of OTP) in order to perform authentication more securely.
